EmailTemplate.description: Sent to the Sales Team when the Owner shares the record.
EmailTemplate.name: Sales Team has been created
EmailTemplate.subject: You are now part of the Sales Team for {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have been included in the Sales Team for the following opportunity:
Opportunity name: {!Opportunity.Name} Owner: {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}
Please click {!Opportunity.Link} to see this opportunity and follow in Chatter for future updates.
Make sure you are logged to Salesforce.com (http://crm.ryder.com) before clicking on the link, then review the record and take appropriate action.
If you click on the link before logging to Salesforce.com, you will be taken to the standard Salesforce.com login page and you won't be able to log in from there.Sincerely,
Ryder Sales Admin
